title: Drawing, Design for Wallpaper or Textile with Stylized Nosegays, ca. 1900–30
title_raw: Design for Wallpaper or Textile with Stylized Nosegays
medium: Gouache, graphite on heavy cream paper
inscribed: at bottom right in graphite:  52; at upper left in graphite:  No 5286; on verso of mount in blue pencil:  Plate #7028
description: Stylized yellow and brown nosegays intersected by leafy green tendrils; clusters of three blossoms in space between nosegays. Graphite guide lines indicating placement.  Prussian blue background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Wallpaper or Textile with Stylized Nosegays, ca. 1900–30. Gouache, graphite on heavy cream paper. 
Gift of Joseph E. Bostany. 1996-26-4
